text:
In what is clearly an ostentatious move, #Serbia's president #AleksandarVučić to join #Turkey's #Erdoğan in taking #China's #Sinopharm #vaccine.

Reminder: Last spring Vučić bashed the #EU, called #XiJinping his "brother" and kissed the Chinese flag.  

#pandemic, #COVID19 https://t.co/k7r2oRkJMM
